Class AddEdgesController

java.lang.Object
  jpizz.controller.AddEdgesController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener
public class AddEdgesController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener

The class represents the controller for adding edges to an event

Author:
jpizz

 void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent me)
          Add an Edge, if it is valid, at the given location of the mouse release Valid if it is between two neighboring lines and not adjacent to any other edges When the maximum number of edges are created, run the CalculateResultsController

Method Detail

mouseReleased

public void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent me)
Add an Edge, if it is valid, at the given location of the mouse release Valid if it is between two neighboring lines and not adjacent to any other edges When the maximum number of edges are created, run the CalculateResultsController
